RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PESO PESADO stalked the pace down the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the five sixteenths pole and took command at the eighth pole to win going away. A'DEBRIS was rushed to a clear lead to set most of the pace but was collared at the eighth pole and stayed on to be second best. MR. BUTCH WOMBLE chased the leader from the inside but failed to menace. MAKE YOUR DESTINY bobbled after the start then trailed the field to the top of the stretch and passed a tiring rival. ALL OF US tracked the leaders to the middle of the turn and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Butch Womble
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader, inside, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Make Your Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Peso Pesado
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3w5/16p, took command 1/8p, going away,

ENTRY.NAME: All of Us
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: A'debris
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, collared 1/8p, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOR KISSES tracked the leaders down the backstretch then made a four wide bid at the three eights pole to take the lead at the three sixteenths pole and held off the late challenge from STARSHIP NOLA for the win. STARSHIP NOLA had no early speed down the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the five sixteenths pole, moved out wider in upper stretch and was gaining on the leader but just missed. BEULAH K vied for the lead from the three path then inched away to take the lead between calls and tired in the stretch. GOTTEMINABIND pressed the pace from between horses to the five sixteenths pole and weakened. ATALANTA ASTERIA remained back. GYPSY JACKPOT went to a pressured lead from the inside to the three furlong pole and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsy Jackpot
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured lead, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nola
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, 3w5/16p, 4wupper, gaining, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Gotteminabind
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mor Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 4w3/8p, lead 3/16p, held on

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adcock's Red River Farm, LLC & J. Adcock

ENTRY.NAME: Beulah K
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, led between calls, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Atalanta Asteria
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPECIAL BREED vied for the lead from three wide around the turn then angled out at the sixteenth pole and made a late surge to just be up for the win. MR. WIMBLEDON BAY stalked the pace from four wide on the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the quarter pole to engage the leader and dueled down the stretch then cleared late but was nailed in the final jump. TEXAS TURBINE dueled for the lead from the inside then took the lead at the three eighths pole but was headed at the top of the stretch and dueled down the stretch and gave way grudgingly. CHEATIN CHARLIE raced near the back to the through the turn then moved out to five wide in upper stretch and was gaining on the leaders then had to steady slightly at the sixteenth pole but rebid to be up for the show. BANKROLL tracked the leaders from the inside then made a rail bid into the stretch and hung late. CHARLIE'S TOWN was last away and trailed the field down the backstretch then launched a bid at the three eighths pole but failed to rally. ROYAL UNLIMITED was hustled along to duel for the lead then vied for the lead to the middle of the turn and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, bid 3/8p, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Turbine
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, led 3/8p, headed, stretch duel, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Cheatin Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 5wupper, gaining, steadied, rebid, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Unlimited
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, dueled for lead, vied, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bankroll
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, rail bid, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Special Breed
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, angled out, late surge, just up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pollock Farms & Town & Country Horse Farms, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Wimbledon Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3w1/4p, engaged, stretch duel, cleared late, nailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 7 1/2F Turf CR: 70. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DADDY HEY DADDY was rushed to a clear lead to set all the pace and was kept to task in the stretch drive. CZAR'S BALLERINA was allowed to settle in the middle of the pack to the final turn then made a bid entering the stretch and bumped MEAN AMERICAN but stayed on for a late gain but was too late. MEAN AMERICAN was off the pace while saving ground through the turn then was in tight and bumped with CZAR'S BALLERINA into the stretch, made a rebid to be up for the show. TRINITY HOPE was unhurried around the first turn then moved up from four wide on the backstretch then moved in to three wide around the final turn and showed late interest to improve position. TARGET VISION tracked the leaders but failed to menace. IRON BANNER was allowed to settle from off the rail down the backstretch but was always back. SERAPE stalked the pace from the two path to the final turn and gave way. AN OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF MEAN AMERICAN CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF CZAR'S BALLERINA FOR ALLEGED INTERFENCE AT THE TOP OF THE STRETCH, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO CHANGES WERE MADE.

ENTRY.NAME: Mean American
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, in tight, rebid, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Banner
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, off rail, always back

ENTRY.NAME: Trinity Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, moved up, 3w2nd, late interest, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Daddy Hey Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Target Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Czar's Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, middle of pack, bumped, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Serape
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 22, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight And Eligibility ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRAFT CHOICE was roused to the lead to set the pace and held on late. COLOR FAST had no speed down the backstretch then moved up from three wide on the turn and made a late stretch rally to be up for the place. GOLDEN PASSAGE was off the pace down the backstretch then made a rail bid into the stretch and was out kicked late and missed the show. FIFTEEN LOVE BACK raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then made a late stretch bid to improve position. LT. BONURA was hustled along to press the pace to the five sixteenths pole and gave way. QUANA DUDE failed to menace. CLEAR HUMOR tracked the leaders on the inside but lacked a late response. PRAY IDE SING was away sharply to vie for the lead from the three path then floated out into the stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Clear Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: roused to lead, set pace, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Quana Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Passage
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail bid, out kicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Color Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, 3wbid turn, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Bonura
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pressed pace, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Pray Ide Sing
ENTRY.COMMENT: away sharply, vied for lead, floated out, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Fifteen Love Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, late bid, improved position

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 22, 2022. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since February 22, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs . Claiming Price $7,500, if for $6,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARCTIC ROSE has an awkward start and was rank around the first turn then split horses entering the backstretch to take the lead, was headed at the five sixteenths pole and matched strides down the stretch inside of SCREENPLAY and dug in to win the nod. SCREENPLAY went to the lead around the first turn then pressed the pace down the backstretch, engaged the leader at the five sixteenths pole and fought gamely outside of ARCTIC ROSE down the stretch but lost the nod. SMOKY TOPAZ was forwardly placed through the turn then lacked room entering the stretch and moved out to three wide to show late interest to be up for the show. FOOLISH DREAMS was allowed to settle inside into the first turn then checked at the seven furlong pole and veered out to the three path down the backstretch then moved out to four wide around the final turn to move up and challenge the leaders but was empty late. CUSTOMIZE MY QUEST was off the pace through the turn then ran into traffic and moved out to five wide in upper stretch but lacked the late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, checked, veer out, 4w2nd turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Arctic Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, rank early, split horses, led, duel stretch, held

ENTRY.NAME: Customize My Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, traffic, 5wupper, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Smoky Topaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, lacked room, 3wupper, late interest, up 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Screenplay
ENTRY.COMMENT: led 1st turn, pressed pace, engaged, fought gamely, lost nod

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COPPER MOON was forwardly placed down the backstretch from four wide and kept on to take the lead at the three sixteenths pole and drew clear late. CCED FOR STEPH was away alertly to be off the pace in the three path, moved up to engage the leader at the three eighths pole to take a brief lead at the five sixteenths pole but was headed at the quarter pole and kept on to be a clear second. CRYPTO BRAVE dueled for the lead from the inside to the seven sixteenths pole then moved out to the two path at the five sixteenths pole to make a rebid but was empty. SUE'S LITTLE ZING was close up down the backstretch then made a mild bid at the quarter pole from three wide but lacked a late response. FUNKYLITTLESHACK was rushed up to duel for the lead from two path and shook loose at the seven sixteenths pole but was collared at the five sixteenths pole and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Crypto Brave
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, angled out 5/16p, rebid, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Funkylittleshack
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, dueled 2p, shook loose, collared, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Sue's Little Zing
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, mild bid, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Cced for Steph
ENTRY.OWNER: Eleven One Racing Stables LLC (Kevin Roberts)
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, off pace, engaged 3/8p, brief lead, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Copper Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Stumpf Donna and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 4w, led 3/16p, drew clear late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: JE Jumonville, Beverly Jumonville, DonnaStumpf, Corale Ric

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7 1/2F Turf CR: 76. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR FOR A CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 120 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 22, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since February 22, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $50, 000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DECCAN PRINCE (IRE) was hustled away and cut the corner around the first turn to take a clear lead and proved much the best. GLUCKSTADT stalked the pace from the two path, moved up on the backstretch but was no match for the winner. QUIET AS MIDNIGHT saved ground down the backstretch then moved out to three wide on the final turn to make a late run to be up for the show. MY LIL DUDE was away alertly to show brief foot to the first turn then was placed off the pace down the backstretch but retreated. UNITEDAPPEAL broke in sharply and trailed. B W P SPIRIT tracked the leaders from the four path down the backstretch and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Unitedappeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in sharply, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Gluckstadt
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, moved up, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Deccan Prince (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled away, clear lead, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: My Lil Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, off pace, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Norman, Mark and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet as Midnight
ENTRY.OWNER: PoBoy Racing LLC and Metoyer Rand S
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, 3w2nd turn, late run, up show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOEY'S GAME was allowed to settle down the backstretch then made a rail bid on the final turn and angled out to three or four wide at the eighth pole and cruised home. BUCK'S GLORY was hustled along to press the pace from the two path then faded slightly on the final turn but dug back in to match strides with UNCLE JETT in early stretch but was out finished by the late closer. UNCLE JETT was rushed up the rail to take a pressured lead down the backstretch then inched away briefly with three furlongs left but was challenged again in a stretch duel with BUCK'S GLORY to the eighth pole and tired. GOLDEN CONFUSION chased the leaders then looked to make a three wide bid at the five sixteenths pole but never gained traction. RICKY RIGHT saved ground to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Jett
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, inside pressured lead, duel, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Confusion
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leaders,3w5/16p, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Ricky Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Game
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Stephen J and Necaise Suzette
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rail bid, 3-4w 1/8p, cruised

ENTRY.NAME: Buck's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pressed pace, fade, stretch duel, out finished
